mapper.select: select permission.* from sys_permission permission where menu_id = #{menu_id} and sys_status = 1
select permission.* from sys_permission permission where permission_id = #{permission_id} and permission.sys_status = 1
select permission.* from sys_permission permission where permission.sys_status = 1 order by if(isnull(permission.modified_time),0,permission.modified_time) desc,permission.created_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_permission ( permission_id, menu_id, operation, request_type, api_url, remarks, creator_id, created_time, modified_time ) select uuid(), #{menu_id}, #{operation}, #{request_type}, #{api_url}, #{remarks}, #{creator_id}, now(), now()
mapper.update: update sys_permission set menu_id = #{menu_id} , operation = #{operation} , request_type = #{request_type}, api_url = #{api_url} , remarks = #{remarks} , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where permission_id = #{permission_id}
mapper.delete: update sys_permission set sys_status = 0 , modifier_id = #{modifier_id} , modified_time = now() where permission_id = #{permission_id}
